meaningMnemonic: The <radical>color</radical> radical and <kanji>color</kanji> are the same in looks as well as in meaning.
readingMnemonic: You already have <kanji>color</kanji> on the mind because you know the meaning of this kanji, so think of something colorful about yourself. Imagine your <reading>ear</reading> (いろ) being a weird color... green, purple, red, whatever. Just make it really bright and standing out.
